Package com.kivojenko.spring.forge.jpa.controller

Class HasNameForgeController<E extends HasName,_ID,R extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<E,_ID> & HasNameRepository<E>>

java.lang.Object
com.kivojenko.spring.forge.jpa.controller.ForgeController<E,_ID,R>
com.kivojenko.spring.forge.jpa.controller.HasNameForgeController<E,_ID,R>
Type Parameters:
E - the entity type
_ID - the ID type
R - the repository type
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudController<E,_ID>
public abstract class HasNameForgeController<E extends HasName,_ID,R extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<E,_ID> & HasNameRepository<E>> extends ForgeController<E,_ID,R>
Extension of ForgeController for entities implementing HasName. Adds an endpoint to search entities by name.

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping(params="name") public Iterable<E> getAll(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0",name="page",required=false) int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="250",name="size",required=false) int size, @RequestParam(required=false,name="name") String name)
      Returns a page of entities, optionally filtered by name.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number (0-indexed)
      size - the page size
      name - the name to filter by (case-insensitive, contains)
      Returns:
      an iterable of entities
